## About I am a Physicist and Computing Engineer from Universidad de los Andes at Bogota, Colombia. I am currently a Master student in Computational Science and Engineering at EPFL at Lausanne, Switzerland. I am interested in cosmic scale astrophysics, medical image computing, education and interdisciplinary fields between computing engineering and physics. I am also an enthusiast of travel, hiking, chess and piano.
